thread.section_title: DesignCrowd Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DesignCrowd | designcrowd.com
thread.title: Thalia

author: Thalia
title: Thalia
text:
DesignCrowd surpassed all my expectations from the very beginning.
The whole process went by so smoothly and I found the logo design of my dreams within the first 48 hours. The designers were all fantastic to work with and were so patient through the revision process. I believe the pricing was extremely reasonable, given how much value I got out of using this service. And to top it all off, I discovered some great designers who I have added as "favourites" that I hope to work with when the next project for my business comes along.
I am SO happy. The world has never seen a more satisfied customer. You haven't seen the last of me, DesignCrowd!
